NamespacePath.description: The fully qualified path to the namespace a resource lives within. For example, 'root.prod.some-feature'. Must begin with 'root'.

NamespaceMatcher.description: A matcher for a namespace. Supports wildcards like 'root.prod.**' or 'root.**'.

namespace.description: The namespace pattern this permission applies to.

resources.description: The types of resources this permission applies to. May include an asterisk (*) to match all resource types.

resource_ids.description: The specific IDs of resources this permission applies to. If empty, applies to all resources of the specified types in the namespace.

verbs.description: The actions permitted on the specified resources.

Permission.description: A permission defining access to resources in a namespace.
